document_data.name: Dragon Scales
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dragon scales''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] used only by specialty priests devoted to [[Tiamat]] called [[Wyrmkeeper]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell protected the wyrmkeeper by causing [[dragon]] scale plating to grow from their skin, covering their entire body except their head. The wyrmkeeper was able to choose the color of the scales from any [[chromatic dragon]] species, but the protection they offered was not determined by the color.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s the priest's [[holy symbol]] and a single dragon scale to cast.
